sample_docs: Portfolio Civil Solutions Biometric Identification Infrastructure – BII™ Biometric Identification System – BIS™ Enrollment Workstation – EWS™ National ID System – NID™ Driver License System – DLS™ Census Registration System – CRS™ Voter Registration System – VRS™ Border Guardian – BG™ Tourist Management System – BioCheckIN Prison Management System – Tartarus™ Law Enforcement AFIS Systems AMIS Shot Law Enforcement MBU™ Idenium Enterprise Time & Attendance Solutions Biometric Sign On Solutions Platforms Civil MBU™ Law Enforcement MBU™ Handheld Devices Stationary Systems Automatic Switch Box – ASB™ Civil Solutions Biometric Identification Infrastructure – BII™ Biometric Identification System – BIS™ Enrollment Workstation – EWS™ National ID System – NID™ Driver License System – DLS™ Census Registration System – CRS™ Voter Registration System – VRS™ Border Guardian – BG™ Tourist Management System – BioCheckIN Prison Management System – Tartarus™ Biometric Identification Infrastructure – BII™ Biometric Identification System – BIS™ Enrollment Workstation – EWS™ National ID System – NID™ Driver License System – DLS™ Census Registration System – CRS™ Voter Registration System – VRS™ Border Guardian – BG™ Tourist Management System – BioCheckIN Prison Management System – Tartarus™ Law Enforcement AFIS Systems AMIS Shot Law Enforcement MBU™ Idenium Enterprise Time & Attendance Solutions Biometric Sign On Solutions Time & Attendance Solutions Biometric Sign On Solutions Platforms Civil MBU™ Law Enforcement MBU™ Handheld Devices Stationary Systems Automatic Switch Box – ASB™ Automatic Switch Box – ASB™ Resources Knowledge Center FAQ About Us Company Profile News & Events Our Portfolio of Biometric Identification Systems The key requirement imposed on civil identification systems is the ability to reliably identify various individuals or groups of people within middle and large scaled applications. A solution based on Bio-Metrica's Biometric Identification Infrastructure (BII) will meet and exceed these requirements. Combating terrorism, crimes, illegal migration and trafficking, global identity fraud – all can be successfully handled by biometric identification solutions designed for civil and law enforcement purposes. Enterprise solutions are comprehensive biometric applications designed to manage access to corporate information resources or track time and attendance. These solutions are designed to handle the identification issues of any organization. The Bio-Metric Mobile Biometric Unit (MBU)™ is a rugged, modular, easy to deploy and configure, portable biometric system that can accommodate a variety of biometric applications. Biometric technology, or Biostatistics, is the science and technology of measuring and analyzing biological data. This field has been studied since the early twentieth century, but these days the future is already here with many applications based on various types of biometrics such as fingerprints, retinas & irises, voice patterns, facial patterns, and hand geometry among many others. As a Manufacturer, system Integrator, or a solution provider, Bio-Metrica will provide you, the government/ corporate user, with the appropriate know-how to purchase the cost effective solution based on an efficient & hassle-free process (Risk Free process), and excellent pre & post sale support. We guarantee it! Whether you are an enterprise shopping for a biometric solution due to industry regulations like the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA), Sarbanes-Oxley (SarbOx or SOX II, etc), or a government agency looking to fulfill the FIPS-201 standard (created after 9/11 events, followed by the HSPD-12 presidential mandate), or an employer seeking an effective solution against buddy punching, tighter workforce control, security management, physical access control for your facility, or any other professional requirement for a biometric solution. You are at the right place!

This field has been studied since the early twentieth century, but these days the future is already here with many applications based on various types of biometrics such as fingerprints,retinas & irises, voice patterns, facial patterns, and hand geometryamong many others. Governemnt & Law Enforcement Applications: As a system Integrator, Developer or a biometric solution provider, Bio-Metrica will provide you, the government/ corporate user, with the appropriate know-how to purchase the cost effectivesolution based on an efficient & hassle-free process (Risk Free process), and excellent pre & post sale support. We guarantee it ! Potential channel partners / Value Added Resellers (VARs) are welcomed to inquire about our VAR program. Se Habla Espaol May 7 2009 Bio-Metrica partners with Bio-Key, a developer of advanced identification solutions and information services to both the private sector and government. Using the 'Web-Key', Bio-Key's web based SDK, Bio-Metrica will offer tailored biometric fingerprint solutions, FULLY INTEGRATED into the end customer's infrastructure. The combination of the best web based biometric fingerprint infrastructure, the variety of biometric fingerprint readers, Optical, Swipe and silicon based sensors, coupled with the extensive biometric related know-how and the engineering capabilities of Bio-Metrica's personnel, provides the best custom design solution for any existing budget! April 10 2009 Bio-Metrica partners with IdentiMetrics, a software vendor of biometric solution dedicated mainly to the Education Sector. Bio-Metrica will offer the 'IdentiFi' software, a 'Plug & Play' type of solution that replaces legacy authentication methods (Barcodes, magnetic stripe cards, PINs) with biometric fingerprint Identification, based on different types of biometric fingerprint readers March 19 2009 Bio-Metrica partners with UPEK to offer the best silicon based sensors in the market place today. Bio-Metrica will offer devices based on the TCS3, TCS1 and TCEF (FIPS-201 compliant) sensors Feb 27 2009 Bio-Metrica partners with Nation Technologies (previously - Biometric Mansagement System) to provide solutions for physical Access Control and Documents protection Feb 10 2009 Bio-Metrica partners with M2SYS. Bio-Metrica will promote biometric solutions for PC based Time & Attendance, Identity Management, replacement of legacy authentication methods and Network & WEB based SDKs Jan 20 2009 Bio-Metrica and BioLink join forces to provide high quality biometric fingerprint solutions for Civil Identification system, Police dedicated biometric solutions, wall mounted Time & Attendance, Network Security systems and SDKs May 7 2009 Bio-Metrica partners with Bio-Key, a developer of advanced identification solutions and information services to both the private sector and government.
